page.title: 17E.ALLINGTON CHANGING TIMES
page.content: We asked the farmers to tell us what change in their environment during their lifetime had affected them most. Here are some of their answers. (1) Introduction of chemicals and artificial fertilizers(4 farmers ) (2) Horses to machines (7 farmers) (3) Motorway and chainsaws (1 farmer) (4) Removal of hedges (5 farmers) (5) Faster pace of farming (1 farmer) (6) Travelling shop doesn't come any more (2 farmers) (7) Electricity and telephone (1 farmer) (8) Land reclamation (1 farmer) (9) Felling of trees (1 farmer)
